scripts.build: yarn workspace @veecode/spacelift-io-shared run build && yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude @veecode/spacelift-io-shared -p run build
scripts.yalc:publish:all: yarn workspace @veecode/spacelift-io-shared run build && yarn workspaces foreach -A -p run yalc:publish
scripts.npm-publish:all: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude @veecode/spacelift-io-backstage-plugins exec npm publish --access public
scripts.dynamic-build:all: yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude @veecode/spacelift-io-backstage-plugins --exclude @veecode/spacelift-io-shared exec npx @janus-idp/cli@latest package export-dynamic-plugin
scripts.dynamic-publish:all: yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude @veecode/spacelift-io-backstage-plugins --exclude @veecode/spacelift-io-shared exec npm publish --access public dist-dynamic/
